Name: Sargasso
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This orange-red bitter sweet drink has a dry oaky complexity.
History: Created in 2008 by Don Lee at PDT , New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Sargasso contains 199 calories
